snippet: Choje Akong Rinpoche, a Tibetan Buddhist leader, apparently had an “economic dispute” with the suspects, the police said. His nephew and driver were also killed.
abstract: Chinese authorities arrest three men in stabbing death of Choje Akong Rinpoche, prominent Tibetan religious leader and British citizen who was attacked and killed in western provincial capital Chengdu.
lead_paragraph: Choje Akong Rinpoche, a Tibetan Buddhist leader, apparently had an “economic dispute” with the suspects, the police said. His nephew and driver were also killed.

headline.main: 3 Arrested in Death of Tibetan Religious Leader in China
headline.print_headline: 3 Arrested in Death of Tibetan Religious Leader in China
